item.title: Justin Baldoni Sues ‘It Ends With Us’ Insurers to Cover Legal Fees
item.description: Baldoni is a part of at least five lawsuits stemming from the film. His company and the production vehicle for the movie have been footing his legal bill.

item.description: The sprawling legal battle features deep pockets on both sides, with the billionaire founder of Paylocity backing Baldoni and Reynolds backing Blake Lively.
